name: Soviet Holiday Card Variety Pack
description: Bring some Cold War cheer into your life this holiday season! These heavyweight 4" x 6" postcards are reproductions of a classic piece of Cold War memorabilia. This set includes all three persuasive pieces of post-war propaganda. Capitalist Swine, Fraternal Greetings, and Sweatshop Santa cards, all to be distributed in equitable amounts. You can read the full story of how these cards came to be over at the GLORP history blog. Purchase these cards in packs of 6, 12, or 21! $2 flat rate first class shipping in the US!

name: Fraternal Greetings Holiday Cards
description: Bring some Cold War cheer into your life this holiday season! These heavyweight 4" x 6" postcards are reproductions of a classic piece of Cold War memorabilia. This design depicts Santa as a benevolent comrade, distributing bountiful gifts to the working class of the world. You can read the full story of how these cards came to be over at the GLORP history blog. Purchase these cards in packs of 4, 8, or 20! $2 flat rate first class shipping in the US!

name: Christmas Swine Holiday Cards
description: Bring some Cold War cheer into your life this holiday season! These heavyweight 4" x 6" postcards are reproductions of a classic piece of Cold War memorabilia. This design depicts dear St. Nick enjoying holiday revelry with his good pals Uncle Sam and Mr. Magnate. A grand ol' time! You can read the full story of how these cards came to be over at the GLORP history blog. Purchase these cards in packs of 4, 8, or 20! $2 flat rate first class shipping in the US!

name: Sweatshop Santa Holiday Cards
description: Bring some Cold War cheer into your life this holiday season! These heavyweight 4" x 6" postcards are reproductions of a classic piece of Cold War memorabilia. This 'Sweatshop Santa' design depicts a merciless St. Nick treading on the backs of the working men and women of America. You can read the full story of how these cards came to be over at the GLORP history blog. Purchase these cards in packs of 4, 8, or 20! $2 flat rate first class shipping in the US!

name: Munny Mouse T-Shirt
description:
Oh, that darned mouse! While most mice are concerned with cheese, this cute lil' guy is busy expanding his massive net worth, absorbing the competition, and copyrighting everything in the known universe! Better nab this beautiful limited edition 2-colored shirt before the mouse comes sniffing around... Printed on a super soft 50/50 Poly/Cotton blend "Charcoal" colored Next Level 6200 t-shirt with water based inks over a discharge underbase, for the softest feeling shirt around!

Size Chart: Shipping info:

name: Kaiju Santa T-Shirt
description:
BEHOLD! The long awaited Kaiju Santa shirt! Baffle your co-workers, terrify your family, and be the talk of the town this holiday season! This 3-color shirt is based on the world famous Kaiju Santa holiday cards that were created by my grandfather back in 1955 (You can read all about them over on my blog). Printed on a super soft 100% ringspun cotton "Natural" colored Next Level 3600 t-shirt with water based inks over a discharge underbase, for the softest feeling shirt around! This limited edition shirt is preorder only, so there will only be a handful of extras hitting the store.

Size Chart: Shipping info:

name: FRIGHT BITE! (With FREE "Ghoul GLORP Gang" T-Shirt)
description:
Looking for a SPOOKtacular treat this Halloween? Well look no further, Ladies and Germs! GLORP FRIGHT BITE is here to scare away that MONSTERous sweet tooth with this EYExciting ocular oddity!
This 2-color shirt shows the entire cast of the 1965 Ghoul GLORP Gang out for their nighttime GLORP Gum deliveries. This incredibly detailed extra large (14x17) print is the finest replica of any GLORP gum shirt yet. This Limited edition shirt will only be available for a short time, so hurry! Printed on a super soft 100% ringspun cotton "Indigo Blue" Next Level 3600 t-shirt with water based inks over a discharge underbase, for the softest feeling shirt around! This shirt looks really great with a set of GLORP IN THE DARK Monster buttons!

Size Chart: Shipping info:

name: Gamma GLORP glow in the dark Monster Buttons!
description:
W-w-what's that strange glowing orb near the graveyard? Is it a g-g-ghost, or a one eyed vampire, or maybe a radioactive cyclops, even?

Don't be GHOULish! It's just someone wearing a cool new Gamma GLORP glow in the dark monster button!

These specially made GLOW IN THE DARK 1.25” metallic button sets and packaging are exact replicas of the Gamma GLORP Monster button sets originally released back in 1965.

Each pack of buttons contains each of the following:

1 GLORPIRE button

1 WEREGLORP button

1 GLORP ZOMBIE button

1 GLORPENSTEIN button

Limited to 25 sets!

name: Scare Package!
description:
All the best monster stuff in one Creepy cool place!

What you get:

1 Package of 5 Glorpoids Trading cards (Sketch card not included) 

1 Ginchy Goul Balls Glorp Gum Sticker

2 Frankenstein lighter stickers (Turns any bic lighter into a Frankenstein head! 

1 Random GLORP in the dark Monster Button! 

What a deal!

name: GLORP XTREME! (With FREE "Who's bad? Party Time!" T-Shirt)
description:
GLORP X-TREME is back! The least sour gum of the sour gum craze of the 90’s has returned to “grunge” up your mouth with real “Gulf War” flavor.
This 4 color T-shirt is an exact reproduction from the “Surf Glorp” line of shirts sold exclusively in Panama City Beach, Florida in 1991. Printed on a super soft 100% ringspun cotton "Light Blue" Next Level 3600 T-shirt with soft hand ink over discharge underbase, for the softest feeling shirt around!

Size Chart: Shipping info:

name: ARCADE BLASTER GUM (with FREE limited edtion T-shirt!)
description:
Got a craving for some vintage arcade action? Then let the great taste of Arcade Blaster Gum take you on a voyage through time. This "Rad" flavored gumball has delicate flavor notes of rusty quarters, palm sweat, and just a hint of greasy ski ball.
This 3-color shirt is an exact replica of the 1987 classic Glorp Gum "Arcade Blaster" T-shirt, and will only be available for a limited time! Printed on a super soft 100% ringspun cotton “Light Blue” Next Level 3600 T-shirt with soft hand ink over discharge underbase, for the softest feeling shirt around!

Size Chart: Shipping info:

name: GLORP HEP GUM (with FREE Glorp Fink T-shirt!)
description:
The gum that made Glorp famous! This rock hard sugar flavored gumball is made using the "Classic" 1960's Glorp gum recipe!
This 2-color T-shirt is an reproduction of the popular 1960's GLORP Fink logo shirt that became one of the biggest fads of the 60's! Printed on a super soft 100% ringspun cotton "Chocolate" Next Level 3600 T-shirt with soft hand ink over discharge underbase, for the softest feeling shirt around!

Size Chart: Shipping info:

name: GLORPOIDS EYEBALL GUM! (With FREE Glorpoids T-shirt!)
description:
Based on the classic 1964 Glorp Gum card series "Glorpoids Destroy!" this terrifying eyeball gum is sure to bring terror and out of this world flavor to your taste buds with the REAL taste of fresh garlic and cinnamon!
This 2-color T-shirt is a reproduction of the wrapper art for the "Glorpoids Destroy!" card set released by Glorp Gum in 1964. Be sure to pick up a set of reproduction cards over HERE! Printed on a super soft 100% ring spun cotton "Midnight Navy" Next Level 3600 T-shirt with soft hand ink over discharge underbase, for the softest feeling shirt around!

Size Chart: Shipping info:

name: Glorpoids destroy! Card Set
description:
In 1964 Glorp Gum jumped on the trading card bandwagon with their "Glorpoids Destroy!" looking card set.  

The card set told the story of mankind’s war against the Glorpoids, a race of bubblegum-like monsters who siphoned the guts from hapless humans to process into “chewable treats” for their people.

Glorpoid cards were considered a massive flop, as many children were confused by the idea of “looking cards”, and tended to stick with their preferred trading cards. The scarcity of these cards have made them highly sought after prizes to many wealthy collectors, and have never before been reprinted...... UNTIL NOW! 

These limited edition card packs perfectly recreate the look and feel of the original cards. Each pack comes with: 

4 Glorpoids Destroy! looking cards

1 Stick of vintage Glorp Gum

1 Sketch card by Bradwick McGinty

All wrapped in a specially recreated wax pack replica wrapper!
DON’T MISS OUT!

name: 1970’s GLORP GUM Warehouse toboggan hat
description:
Imagine, if you will, that it is February 3rd 1970’s and you’re a warehouse worker in the beautifully unheated GLORP Gum factory in scenic Minneapolis, MN. 

Now, imagine that you look down and catch your reflection on the icy ground below as you brush the coal soot from your cheeks. You cannot help but notice the jaunty color of the orange toboggan hat that insulates your poor, overworked head.  

Now, imagine that it is right now, and you’re reading these words on the screen of the computer and asking aloud “how can I bring the stylish couture of the 1970’s working class man or woman into my home?” Now stop imagining and realize that the answer is EASILY!

This extremely limited edition orange toboggan hat is an exact replica of the warehouse hats distributed to Glorp Gum warehouse workers in the 1970’s to solve the company’s rampant frostbite issue related to terrible working conditions. 

The hat itself is a GAP brand 78% lambs wool 22% nylon hat. Super nice, not some cheap gas station thing or anything like that. 
Super limited! So get one while they last!

name: VINTAGE GLORP GUM BUTTON SETS
description:
These specially made 1.25” metallic buttons sets are the greatest things on earth! No sassy descriptions needed. 

Three different designs, 12 color variations, and 7 background variations means there are LITERALLY 252 different buttons for you to collect! 

Each set is different, but will contain one of each button design. 

Some single color sets are available in the drop down menu, if you need to match your prom dress color or something super important like that.

name: GLORP GUM MACHINE STICKERS!
description:
Can you imagine the trouble you could cause if you stuck a one of these vintage gum insert card stickers on a modern gumball machine at your local food mart? I can, and it is hilarious. You are a funny dude/dudette for 100% sure.

These full color vinyl stickers are amazing reproductions of GLORP GUM vending machine insert cards from GLORP's 50 plus years as "America’s best chew value". 

Each sticker is 3.5 x 4 inches and printed on the highest quality outdoor durable vinyl and UV coated for maximum protection from the elements.

name: 1970’s GLORP GUM PATCH!
description:
Need a great way to tell the world you’re a gum chewing badass? Well, this might be just the thing for you. Imagine the conversations people will have when they see you with this patch:

Person 1: That guy has a patch on his hat, jacket or bag!

Person 2: I know! He must be in a gang!

You: Step off, oldies! I’m a gum chewing bad ass, ya’ hear! (Bird flipping sound)

2.5 inch patch with Yellow, brown, orange, and grey thread on a blue cyan twill background.

name: FUN PATROL PRIZE PACK!
description:
Are you the type of person who just wants the frosting and not the cake? Well, I think that is totally gross, but I get it. 

You get:

1 Predanerd sticker

1 Chestburster sticker

1 Random Glorp Gum insert card sticker

2 Gross Guts Gang trading cards

1 Troll Jamzz Trading card

4 Glorpoids Destroy trading cards

1 Metallic 1.25'' Glorp Gum button Button

And a few random vintage trading cards! 

WHAT A DEAL!

name: Who's bad? Party time! And Glorpoid 8.5x11 Posters!
description:
8.5x11 offset professionally printed semigloss posters suitable for dressing up all cubicles and or fridges.

1 "Who's bad? Party time!" poster 

1 Glorpoids poster!

Nothing fancy here, just nicely printed posters for cheap!

name: HOLIDAY CARD VARIETY PACK!
description: Think one specific holiday card for your friends and family is a chump move? Then this pack is for you! Let's pretend it's a fancy cocktail: HOLIDAY CARD VARIETY PACK! 1 Part Kaiju Santa Greeting Cards 1 Part Santorg vs Meno-Rah cards 1 Part Santis cards 1 Part USA Holiday Devil Cards Splash of sweet Vermouth. Serve over ice with Candy Cane garnish. 4x6 postcards available in packs of 4, 8, and 20! Find out the whole story of the long lost Japanese Monster movie these cards are based on, and see the newly found footage HERE.

name: SANTIS! Holiday Cards
description: "Naughty Or Nice, the SANTIS will strike!" These holiday cards will surely bring confusion and terror to your friends and family! 4x6 postcards available in packs of 4, 8, and 20! Find out the whole story of the film these cards are based on, and see the newly found footage HERE.

name: USA Holiday Devil Greeting Cards
description: SHOCK YOUR FAMILY! CONFUSE YOUR FRIENDS! BAFFLE LONG LOST COUSINS! ...With these cards that feature the original Japanese poster for the long lost film: USA Holiday Devil Battles Jewish Lamp. 4x6 postcards available in packs of 4, 8, and 20! Find out the whole story of the film these cards are based on, and see the newly found footage HERE.

name: SANTORG vs MENO-RAH Holiday Cards
description: Santorg! Raging out of the frozen earth! Meno-Rah! Screaming the challenge of eight days of battle! Who will win the battle for the holidays? You will, when you send out these great looking cards! 4x6 postcards available in packs of 4, 8, and 20! Find out the whole story of the film these cards are based on, and see the newly found footage HERE.

name: Kaiju Santa Greeting Cards!
description: Why not make my grandfather happy and send some of these cards to your friends and family this holiday season? That’s right, I’m offering what is left of my grandfather’s failed hopes and dreams for a mere $5! Read the full story of my grandfather's cards right Here

name: ROBERT COP 2 T-shirt
description:
America's number 1 bootleg toy is about to become America's number 1 bootleg shirt! (if it's possible to bootleg already bootlegged merch that is) This swank 4 color design is printed on a "Light Blue" Next Level 100% ring-spun cotton uni-sex shirt. Printed using a soft ink over discharge underbase screen-printing method (no thick plastisol inks here, folks!) making this the softest and classiest shirt available anywhere on the Internet!

Size Chart: Shipping info:

name: Frankenstein Lighter Sticker
description:
Got a lighter? Tired of people stealing it? Wanna make it into the coolest lighter around? Then pony up some bread and get 3 of these stickers! Or if you would like to protect your lighters year round head over to

LIGHTER OF THE MONTH CLUB.

and get 4 different stickers sent right to your door every month!

name: Custom T-Shirt design and 73 shirts!
description: Need a T-Shirt designed for you, your band, or your brand? Then this is the deal for you! Get a 1,2, or 3 color custom design printed on 72 Next level 100% ring-spun cotton cotton T-shirts for one great price! These shirt blanks are my absolute favorite shirts and come in lots of different colors. Here is a link to the 100% cotton color page and here is the link to the Tri-Blend color page. The shirts are printed with the same soft hand ink over discharge under-base that I use for all of my T-Shirts (All your friends will be super impressed, trust me). You will also get the artwork files so you can print more shirts anytime you need them! IT"S ALL YOURS!! This is a limited time deal, so now is your chance to get some amazing shirts to sell on your website, your front lawn, or even at your band's next big "gig"! *Shipping is not included in this price, but will be calculated after your order is placed.

name: ANATOMY PRINT SET
description:
Looking to get both the Anatomy of the Alien print and The Anatomy of the Predator print together? Hoping to score a sweet bonus print? Well you’re in luck! Get all 3 of these prints together for one low price! Note: These Prints will be signed, but NOT numbered as I have sold the entire limited edition run of prints. Would you like to get first dibs on the prints? Then sign up for my Email Party! The Xenomorph and Predator prints are 9×12 The Facehugger print is 5 3/4 x 9 Printed on cream colored Canson acid-free watercolor paper With Epson Durabrite inks

FREE SHIPPING!

name: GROSS GUTS GANG: Dunld pin set
description:
Way back in 1989 I spent my entire allowance buying all of the GROSS GUTS GANG pin sets I could find. Lucky for me the product lines was a total failure, and I could easily find the super cheap series of pins and trading cards on the clearance rack at all of the local discount stores.  

But it’s no longer 1989, and my mom says I have to grow up and leave my childish pursuits behind. SO now I’m doing you a total solid and selling off my collection of GROSS GUTS GANG pins for next to nothing!

This pin set is of the character Dunuld, which I am pretty sure is homage to the sinking of the Lusitania. It’s no wonder that the GROSS GUTS GANG line of merchandise never took off. I mean, what kid would want a pin set featuring a reference to the sinking of a British passenger ship from1915?

name: GROSS GUTS GANG: Mukee pin set
description:
Way back in 1989 I spent my entire allowance buying all of the GROSS GUTS GANG pin sets I could find. Lucky for me the product lines was a total failure, and I could easily find the super cheap series of pins and trading cards on the clearance rack at all of the local discount stores. 
 
But it’s no longer 1989, and my mom says I have to grow up and leave my childish pursuits behind. SO now I’m doing you a total solid and selling off my collection of GROSS GUTS GANG pins for next to nothing!

This one is Mukee, which is a parody of an old Hanna Barbara character called Magila The Gorilla. It’s a pretty terrible drawing of a gorilla, but I think that makes it even more fun.

name: GROSS GUTS GANG: Grffy pin set
description:
Way back in 1989 I spent my entire allowance buying all of the GROSS GUTS GANG pin sets I could find. Lucky for me the product lines was a total failure, and I could easily find the super cheap series of pins and trading cards on the clearance rack at all of the local discount stores.  

But it’s no longer 1989, and my mom says I have to grow up and leave my childish pursuits behind. SO now I’m doing you a total solid and selling off my collection of GROSS GUTS GANG pins for next to nothing!
This one is Grrfy. I think he was supposed to be an Alf parody maybe? I’m not too sure. 

FUN FACT: Some kid choked on the original head button (with the hat) back in 1988. They recalled the remaining Grrfy sets and replaced the head pin with a hatless verison. I was luck enough to score some of the rare “Hat Head” Grffy pins before they became a collector’s item. You may get lucky and get a “Hat Head” Grffy if you order soon!

name: 8 pages of Original Regular Show art (issue 3 of the comic book)
description:
This is my complete 8 page story from an upcoming issue (issue 3 ) of Regular Show. The story is called "Sombrero World" and is a backup story in issue 2 of the KABOOM studios Regular Show comic book. 

Each of the 8 pages are 11x14 90lb cream colored Canson Paper.   

Each page is penciled with red colrase pencil and inked with a brush. The Blue lines are printed on each page in Archival cyan Epson ink.   

The pages are hand lettered.    

The pages will be shipped flat via UPS.  

This story has not seen print yet, so pages cannot be completely shown here, if you would like to see more pictures please email me via the contact form on this site link http://bradmcginty.bigcartel.com/contact

name: 8 pages of Original Adventure Time art (issue 28 of the comic book)
description:
This is my complete 8 page story from an upcoming issue (issue 28) of Adventure Time. The story is called "Grocery Time" and is a backup story in issue 28 of the BOOM studios Adventure Time comic book. This is my first work form a major publisher. 

Each of the 8 pages are 11x14 90lb cream colored Canson Paper. 

Each page is penciled with red colrase pencil and inked with a brush. The Blue lines are printed on each page in Archival cyan Epson ink. 

The pages are hand lettered (lettering not shown in pictures)  

The pages will be shipped flat via UPS.

This story has not seen print yet, so pages cannot be completely shown here, if you would like to see more pictures please email me via the contact form on this site link http://bradmcginty.bigcartel.com/contact

There is also a cover available, but is not shown. Email above link for details.

name: Anatomy Of The Gremlin Print
description:
BEHOLD! The innards of the most terrifying creature to ever appear in a PG rated film! This anatomical guide is an exact replica of a tattered document found in a dusty antique store in Chinatown in 1984. While the priceless original is kept in a safety deposit box on the international space station, this 9x12 reproduction can be examined in the comfort and security of your own home. Print is 9×12 (including border) Printed on Borden & Riley Rough finish 98 gram "Craft" paper With Epson Durabrite inks Signed and numbered Limited edition of 50

FREE SHIPPING!

name: Anatomy Of The Mogwai Print
description:
Do you own a Mogwai? Do you plan on purchasing one? Then this, my friend, is the perfect gift for you! Not only will this instructional sheet help you care for and better understand your Mogwai, but it will also serve as a daily reminder the three rules that must be followed to ensure that your Mogwai companion remains happy and healthy for years to come. This anatomical guide is an exact replica of an original instructional document found in antique store in Chinatown in 1984. While only Richard Bronson could afford the original specimen, this handsome reproduction printed on Borden & Riley Rough finish 98 gram "Craft" paper can be yours for only $25. UPDATE: The signed and numbered edition has sold out! If you order this print it will be signed but NOT NUMBERED. If you would like to get first dibs on the numbered editions Sign up for my Email Party!

FREE SHIPPING!

Print is 9×12 (including border) Printed on Borden & Riley Rough finish 98 gram "Craft" paper With Epson Durabrite inks

name: ANATOMY OF THE XENOMORPH PRINT
description:
The (almost) original print that kicked of the entire series! This handsome print is sure to strike up conversation with any geek that is worth his or her salt. Originally created as an illustration for the WAP Halloweridos Halloween illustration event in October of 2011, this image was created as homage to a book called An Anatomical Guide To Monsters featuring the gruesome insides of some of the most famous Kaiju monsters of the sixties. This project reawakened my love of drawing lots of gory guts. Soon after finishing this drawing I decided to create a series of anatomical drawings of American monsters, which I am continuing to work on. The original run of signed and numbered prints has sold out. While this run is the same as the first, prints will be signed in the left corner of the print, and will not be numbered. If you’re interested in getting numbered editions of my prints, join the mailing list to find out first about new designs. Print is 9×12 with border Printed on cream colored Canson acid-free watercolor paper With Epson Durabrite inks

FREE SHIPPING!

name: ANATOMY OF THE PREDATOR PRINT
description:
You know how when you’re inking a drawing and your mind creates an unbreakable focus beam that practically burns through the paper with super laser heat? Yeah, me neither. When I’m inking a drawing my mind wanders more than a Trey Anastaio guitar solo (LOL!) And more often than not I daydream about projects that I will probably never have the time or money to complete. While working on an Anatomical Guide to the Xenomorph drawing I got the idea of a larger project that involved anatomical breakdowns of popular American monsters. I thought about all the cool monsters there were to draw, and what a great book it would make, and how I wish someone else did this already so I could skip all the drawing and just own the book right now. But alas, it’s up to me to make these things. Here’s the second in the series: Print is 9×12 with border Printed on cream colored Canson acid-free watercolor paper With Epson Durabrite inks

FREE SHIPPING!

NOTE: Only 10 signed and numbered editions are still available.

name: Frankenstein Of Mars
description:
I did about 30 pages of comics based around this story, none of which were as good as this one illustration! Don’t let those hours of my life be wasted!

FREE SHIPPING!

Print is 9×12 with border Printed on cream colored Canson acid-free watercolor paper With Epson Durabrite inks

name: Chestburster Sticker
description:
Slap this beautiful full color all purpose weather proof Chestburster sticker on any thing you own that needs to look a million times better. Why are you reading this? Just look at it! I can hear the money leaving your pay pal account already!

FREE SHIPPING!

name: ANATOMY OF THE PREDATOR T-SHIRT
description:
Here it is! The Anatomy of the Predator T-shirt in a new Dark Teal color! This stylish shirt is the perfect thing to get you "to tha Choppa!".

The image is printed in light and dark blue on a dark teal 100% ring spun cotton NEXT LEVEL 9600 t-shirt, and it looks amazing!

Comes with a PREDANERD sticker!

name: ANATOMY OF THE XENOMORPH T-SHIRT
description: Tired of not being stopped in the street by baffled strangers? Do you wish other nerds would accost you in the shops to ask about your cool fashions? If you answered in the affirmative to either of these questions THEN YOU’VE FOUND THE PERFECT SHIRT! This amazing shirt is a poppy colored American Apparel 100% ring-spun cotton uni-sex shirt. Printed using a soft ink over discharge underbase screen-printing method (no thick plastisol inks here, folks!) making this the softest and classiest shirt available anywhere on the Internet! SIZE CHART “The only thing more elegant and beautiful than HR Geiger’s original design for the Xenomorph is this fantastic shirt” – Ridley Scott

name: ANATOMY OF THE GREMLIN T-SHIRT!
description: You need to wear something while you’re washing your Anatomy of the Mogwai shirt shirt, right? Well that’s what the Anatomy of the Gremlin shirt is for! This 2-color design is made for all manner of after-midnight fun! Printed on an olive colored American Apparel 100% ring spun cotton shirt. SIZE CHART

name: ANATOMY OF THE MOGWAI T-SHIRT!
description: My favorite shirt yet! This 2-color beauty is sure to make all your friends insanely jealous. Just look at the dark brown 100% ring spun cotton American Apparel shirt it’s printed on! HOW COULD YOU NOT BUY IT?! SIZE CHART
